content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DTC
      operator: invalid_date
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.66
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Variables that include dates (--DTC) are required to be presented according
  to the international standard ISO 8601 date or date/time format
Outcome:
  Message: Variable value is not in ISO 8601 date / datetime format
  Output Variables:
    - --DTC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '66'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The SENDIG requires dates and times of day to be stored
                  according to the international standard ISO 8601 (http://www.iso.org).
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: '4.4'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Variables that include dates (--DTC) are required to be presented according to the international standard ISO 8601 date or date/time format

Outcome.Message: Variable value is not in ISO 8601 date / datetime format

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The SENDIG requires dates and times of day to be stored according to the international standard ISO 8601 (http://www.iso.org).
